name: The Last of Bus (Gonzalo Frias - Game Developer)
name_original: The Last of Bus (Gonzalo Frias - Game Developer)
description:
Viajan en el ultimo colectivo para rescatar a la mayor cantidad de gente. Tendrás que enfrentarte a varios obstáculos para lograrlo. Travel in the last bus to rescue the most people posible. You ll have to confront any type of obstacules to make it

Credits:

Gonzalo Frias
